TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit FileChangeMonitor extends System.Runtime.Caching.ChangeMonitor
Public MustInherit Class FileChangeMonitor Inherits ChangeMonitor
public ref class FileChangeMonitor abstract : System::Runtime::Caching::ChangeMonitor

summary.span: 表示用于监视对文件的更改的对象。

span.span: Represents an object that monitors changes to files.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是 监视文件更改的类的基类型。The class is a base type for classes that monitor changes to files. 若要为文件系统中的更改创建监视器，可以从此类继承。To create a monitor for changes in the file system, you can inherit from this class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建一个缓存项，该缓存项使用 对象来监视源数据的状态 (文件系统上的文件) 。The following example shows how to create a cache item that uses a object to monitor the state of the source data (a file) on the file system. 类从 类继承。The class inherits from the class. 缓存项是使用对象定义的 ，该对象提供缓存项的逐出和过期详细信息。The cache entry is defined using a object that provides eviction and expiration details for the cache entry. [!code-csharp[CachingASPNetApplications#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/cachingaspnetapplications/cs/default.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CachingASPNetApplications#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/cachingaspnetapplications/vb/default.aspx.vb#1)]

para.span: 有关必须遵循的继承约定的信息，请参阅类概述中的对继承者的说明部分 。

span.span: For information about the inheritance contract that must be followed, see the Notes for Inheritors section in the class overview.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 从派生类中的构造函数调用此构造函数以初始化基类。

span.span: This constructor is called from constructors in derived classes in order to initialize the base class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property FilePaths As ReadOnlyCollection(Of String)

summary.span: 获取一个集合，该集合包含要监视其是否发生更改的文件路径。

span.span: Gets a collection that contains the paths of files that are monitored for changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合通常在派生类型的构造函数中进行设置 。The collection is typically set in the constructor of a derived type. 若要提供自定义文件更改监视，必须在派生类中重写此方法。To provide custom file-change monitoring, you must override this method in a derived class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property LastModified As DateTimeOffset
public: abstract property DateTimeOffset LastModified { DateTimeOffset get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示所监视文件的上次更改时间。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates the last time that a file that is being monitored was changed.

value.span: 如果监视多个文件，则为最近修改的文件的上次修改时间；否则为所监视文件的上次更改时间。

span.span: If multiple files are monitored, the last modified time of the most recently modified file; otherwise, the last time that the file that is being monitored was changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，在 派生类的初始化阶段计算属性的值。The value of the property is typically calculated during the initialization phase of a derived class. 若要提供自定义文件更改监视，必须在派生类中重写此方法。To provide custom file change monitoring, you must override this method in a derived class.
